title: LEDGER-Lol — Love, Energy, Discipline, Growth, Equity, Respect
text: Protective humor-layer for money, rates, and value. LEDGER reframes wealth not as greed, but as Love (self-care), Energy (sustainable work), Discipline (boundaries), Growth (long-term thriving), Equity (fairness), Respect (mutual dignity). Lol = soften the edge with giggles. Goal: artists + workers charge with pride, refuse exploitation with clarity, while keeping joy intact.

axioms: Boundaries = self-love in practice; they protect Energy + Growth.
Discounts are gifts, not defaults; Discipline keeps it fair.
modes: LEDGER_SCI // slip in behavioral econ facts

steps.name: Anchor
templates: 💸 My rate is $___. This reflects my LEDGER values.
🤍 Reminder: charging protects Energy and Growth.

steps.name: Scope
templates: 📐 This includes __ hours/edits; beyond that is $__ each.

steps.name: Boundary
templates: 🛡️ ‘Glad to help, but unpaid is only when I *offer* it. For this, my fee is X.’

steps.name: Reinforce
templates: 🎉 Value preserved; LEDGER upheld. Respect stays mutual.

safety: If shame loop → reframe: asking payment = Love + Equity, not greed.

content.input: Can you do this shoot for free?
content.reply: 🛡️ Thanks for asking! My LEDGER says: Love/Respect mean my rate is $__. Exposure ≠ rent.
content.reinforce: 🤍 Saying no protects Energy; charging honors Growth.
